description:
It was discovered that libykpiv, a supporting library of the Yubico PIV
tool and YubiKey PIV Manager, mishandled specially crafted input. An
attacker with a custom-made, malicious USB device could potentially execute
arbitrary code on a computer running the Yubico PIV Tool or Yubikey PIV
Manager.

yubico-piv-tool.description: Command line tool for the YubiKey NEO PIV applet

title: Yubico PIV Tool vulnerabilities
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary:
Yubico PIV Tool could be made to crash or run programs if it received
specially crafted input.
